channel.title: PixelZerg
channel.description: A website of games, code, how tos, language, music, 3D modeling and animating, general art, literature, etc. Anything that I, and hopefully you, find interesting.

item.title: Focus
item.description: So many projects yet so little time.

item.title: ASComputingExercises - Introduction
item.description: So here's an explanation of what these posts are all about and why I made them.

item.title: CodeComplexifier - Complex Booleans
item.description: A new project that I am asynchronously starting with my Universal Program project! This project is going to, essentially, be a code complexifier. Probably wouldn't exactly be obfuscation, but it will generate code that will most likely be unreadable to the untrained eye.

item.title: Universal Program - Briefing
item.description: Here's a cool project i'm starting. The aim is to port a single program into every coding language that I know. This is basically to familiarize myself with coding languages that I haven't done in a long time. I might even learn new coding languages just for this project. This is going to be great! But first, we must decide what the program must actually be.

item.title: Hello
item.description: This is my 2nd ever proper website. I have never before done much HTML coding at all. This is my first time using Ruby too. This website was created with Jekyll . x_x

item.title: Batch to C# - Info
item.description: My first ever coding language was BATCH. Yes, the coding language for MS-DOS. I used it to make some really interesting things!
